```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```


## Problem1

**Load the data**

```{r}
library(p8105.datasets)
data("instacart")
```

**How many aisles are there, and which aisles are the most items ordered from?**
```{r}
aisle_df = count(instacart, aisle) %>%
  arrange(desc(n))
```

**Answer:** According to the result of the chunk above, there are 134 different aisles while fresh vegetables are the most items ordered from.
